line_1: Some dangers too, he well subdues,
line_2: He yet a while the path pursues,

line_1: Aims at the Head, but the rapt Soul subdues.
line_2: The witty Fair one nobler Game pursues,

line_1: Dark Lethe's cup each grief subdues,
line_2: That used on former joys to muse;

line_1: Absorbs my senses, and my mind subdues,
line_2: Or the just tribute of a pang refuse.

line_1: Appall'd, the blow which heav'n's first right subdues.
line_2: Creation starts, and shrinking Nature views
